judges: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K. KANNAN . Whether Reporters of local papers may be allowed to see the judgment
judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT FOR THE STATES OF PUNJAB AND HARYANA AT
CHANDIGARH
C.W.P. No.6210 of 1994 (O&M)
Date of Decision.02.11.2012
Subhash Chander (Roll No.52383) Post Patwari s/o Tek Chand, r/o Dabi
Khurd, Tehsil Fatehabad, District Hissar and others
.....Petitioners
Versus
State of Haryana through the Secretary to Government of Haryana,
Revenue Department, Haryana Civil Secretariat, Chandigarh and others
.....Respondents
Present: 
None for the petitioners.
Mr. D.D. Gupta, Addl. A.G., Haryana.

CORAM:HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K. KANNAN
. Whether Reporters of local papers may be allowed to see the
judgment ? No
. 
To be referred to the Reporters or not ? No
. Whether the judgment should be reported in the Digest? No
-.-
K. KANNAN J.(ORAL)
For detailed order, see order passed in C.W.P. No.13598 of
of even date.
(K. KANNAN)
 JUDGE 
November 02, 2012
Pankaj*
